extendedInfo.description: Provides a heads-up overview over critical AdSense performance metrics, including CPM, CTR, page views, clicks, and estimated revenue, in easily-digestible form.  Includes a desktop widget showing today's vital statistics.Uses Google's AdSense Management API to provide a secure, read-only view of your data.Supports phones with large screens, tablets, and now Google TV (for those that want an always-on dashboard for their office).Provides most of the content of the AdSense home page and the default report.To use this application you must: - Have a working, stable network connection (known bug) - Have an existing AdSense account - Have the Google Account associated with that account configured as an account on your phone.Crashes are *not* common - but if you see one, please email me.  I can't fix if you don't help, and a comment here isn't a bug report - I can't get useful problem logs because it's sensitive data, so I can't find and fix bugs without an email from *you*.  Send problem reports to gblock@ctoforaday.com and I'll fix them as fast as is humanly possible.Known issues: - You can't change currency.  (We show your AdSense account's currency.)Features to come: - Single-fact 1x1 widget

reviews.title: Awesome app
reviews.comment: Love to use and check my earnings with all useful stats... Waiting for cool future updates
reviews.author: Abhishek Vohera

reviews.title: No more revenue data
reviews.comment: Estimated revenue is no longer available. What good is that? This app (that I have been using for quite some time is basically useless now)  Please fix this.
reviews.author: Luciano La Delfa

reviews.title: Its the best app for adsense in the store.
reviews.comment: I love this app works great on stock rom. But unfortunately when I switch to custom rom and installed this app again.. I\'m getting Couldn\'t sign in errors... I hope the developer fix this issue soon. Thank you for all your hard work.
reviews.author: Ankit Anand

reviews.title: Does what I need
reviews.comment: I mainly downloaded this because it gives me all the stats I want including clicks which the Google app doesn\'t even do. The interface could be a bit more \"holo\" but I can\'t really complain. Best adsense/admob app there is
reviews.author: Matthew Holtzem

reviews.title: WOW even better than Google
reviews.comment: WOW this app is easier to use than Google, and presents excellent information. Very well done! It is so nice to have my AdSense info on my phone.   To those who think the app steals your code - not likely. Google has rolled out several updates, such as edm and penguin revisions etc.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Great App!
reviews.author: Scott Severt

reviews.title: Best
reviews.comment: Best adsense app! So simple yet informative!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Missing something important
reviews.comment: Its a great app. I love it. But it\'s missing the \"unpaid earnings\" section. I need to know when I hit 100$ lol.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: It just works!
reviews.comment: There haven\'t been any bugs or any negative experience with this app. It gets me the info I need and quickly...No fuss. Thanks for a nice simple app that just works!
reviews.author: Brad Parham

reviews.title: great
reviews.comment: would be nice to see page veiws on compiled page which totals your averages. mind you id like to know how the demo acc makes so much money :)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good app
reviews.comment: Very good and useful. Sometime has a glitch that it says you haven\'t got an account but half an hour later works fine. I use this every day and like it
reviews.author: Jaken Gardner

reviews.title: Would love a YouTube option.
reviews.comment: I use this to track YouTube earnings. It would bevgreat to have a YouTube option that multiplies RPM by page views and deducted a percentage to get an estimated YouTube earning. As an option or a separate app would be happy to pay.
reviews.author: Mark Chi

reviews.title: Better than the mobile site
reviews.comment: If you use AdSense this app is a no brainer. It gives you pretty much all you can ask for
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Beautiful, Functional
reviews.comment: This app is exactly what I wanted to get updates on my Adsense account. Also has a great desktop widget!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: It used to work great...
reviews.comment: Now that Google has changed the way it reports your earnings, this app doesn\'t do much. Still shows how many clicks and views you get, but won\'t show your earnings thanks to Google and YouTube.
reviews.author: Joshua Folckemer

reviews.title: Love The Widget
reviews.comment: This app is epic. Has a widget where it refreshes your adsense earning throughout the day. I can quickly see how much money I\'ve made today. Love the app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very useful
reviews.comment: Is it possible to separate youtube earnings from adsense? Because google already separated the youtube earnings report from the main adsense reports. So in your widget I can see lots of clicks but 0 earnings because most of it is from youtube.
reviews.author: Michael James Fabian

reviews.title: Simply the best!
reviews.comment: I LOVE this app! Must have for any webmaster with an android device. Only things I would like to see is the option to filter by day, week, month etc. as well as the option to filter earnings by site. The option to see total amount earned since last payout would be nice, too. If you made a pro/donate version with these, I (as I\'m sure other webmasters) would be glad to support your work. - T-Mobile Samsung Vibrant / SlimICS v4.1
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: doesn\'t match
reviews.comment: Why does the app tell me a different total and earnings then the Dashboard does?  Great app but is it really accurate?  There\'s a difference of around 2$! Not much but still!
reviews.author: A Google User
